entry.title: AIR STAGNATION ADVISORY THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING
entry.summary: November 20, 2023 4:00 a.m. An Air Stagnation Advisory is in effect through 10:00 a.m. Tuesday for inland areas in southern Oregon, including the Umpqua Valley. Forecasters at the National Weather Service said air stagnation is likely to result in diminishing air quality with time, especially in and near areas with significant sources of air...

entry.title: NOVEMBER WARMER AND WETTER THAN NORMAL
entry.summary: November 20, 2023 3:50 a.m. This November has been warmer and wetter than normal in the Umpqua Valley. Forecasters at the National Weather Service told News Radio 93-9 FM and 1240 KQEN that the average temperature this month at the Roseburg Regional Airport has been 52.9 degrees, which is 4 degrees warmer than average. That...

entry.summary: November 20, 2023 3:40 a.m. Monique DeSpain has launched her campaign for the Republican nomination for Congress in the 4th District. entry.summary: ROSEBURG — Applications are being accepted from individuals interested in serving on the Roseburg Economic Development Commission. The commission will have two vacancies beginning Dec. 31.

entry.summary: ELKTON — Elkton Community Education Center received a $37,500 grant from Travel Oregon to enhance a 14-acre parcel of land along the Umpqua river by extending a walking path, improving driveways, improve upon existing paths to be more accessible.
